name: swi_process
description: Process the Susceptibility-weighted images. Ensure the inputs are post-phase unwrapping using PRELUDE.

inputs.name: Magnitude Image
inputs.description: The magnitude image (Output from the PRELUDE program)

inputs.name: Phase Image
inputs.description: The phase image (Output from the PRELUDE program)

inputs.name: SWI Output Image
inputs.description: Name of the SWI processed output image

inputs.name: Standard Deviation
inputs.description: Specify the standard deviation of the Gaussian Smoothing Filter. Default is 2.0

inputs.name: Phase Mask Cutoff
inputs.description: Specify the negative phase mask cutoff frequency (in radians). Default is the minimum value of the phase image.

inputs.name: Phase Mask Right Cutoff
inputs.description: Specify the positive phase mask cutoff frequency (in radians). Default is the maximum value of the phase image.

inputs.name: Sigmoid A
inputs.description: Specify 'a' for the sigmoid formula f(phase)=1/(1+exp(-a*(phase-b))). Default is 1.0. Meaningless with phase_method != sigmoid

inputs.name: Sigmoid B
inputs.description: Specify 'b' for the sigmoid formula f(phase)=1/(1+exp(-a*(phase-b))). Default is 0.0. Meaningless with phase_method != sigmoid

inputs.name: Phase Multiplications
inputs.description: Specify the number of phase multiplications. Default is 4

inputs.name: MIP Level
inputs.description: Specify the number of levels of mIP across the y direction. Default is 4

inputs.name: Phase Mask Method
inputs.description: Specify the phase mask method. One of negative, positive, symmetric, asymmetric, sigmoid. Default is negative

author: FreeSurfer Developers
